labs.name: Git and Version Control
labs.desc: This lab teaches how to plan, structure, and design a project so that later development is simplified.

labs.name: Calculator, Part 1
labs.desc: This lab aims to review HTML and CSS in order to create the skeleton and styling for the To-Do list.

labs.name: Calculator, Part 2
labs.desc: This lab uses AJAX requests and DOM manipulation in order to complete the To-Do List app.
